name: Low Carb English Muffins
ingredients: Cooking spray or additional oil for greasing
utensils: 2 microwaveable dishes (about 4 1/2" in diameter with straight sides)

instructions.en: In a small bowl, beat the egg, water, and oil with a fork until well blended.
instructions.sk: V malej miske vyšľahajte vidličkou vajce, vodu a olej, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに卵、水、油を入れ、フォークでよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: In another small bowl, mix the Carbquik, golden flax meal, Splenda (if using), baking powder, and salt.
instructions.sk: V druhej malej miske zmiešajte Carbquik, zlaté ľanové semienka, Splendu (ak používate), prášok do pečiva a soľ.
instructions.ja: 別の小さなボウルにCarbquik、ゴールデンフラックスミール、スプレンダ（使用する場合）、ベーキングパウダー、塩を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Whisk the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients until well combined.
instructions.sk: Vyšľahajte suché prísady do mokrých prísad, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: 乾燥材料を湿った材料に加え、よく混ざるまで泡立て器で混ぜます。

instructions.en: Grease two microwaveable dishes (about 4 1/2" in diameter with straight sides).
instructions.sk: Vymastite dve nádoby vhodné do mikrovlnnej rúry (s priemerom asi 11,5 cm a rovnými stenami).
instructions.ja: 電子レンジ対応の直径約4.5インチ（約11.5cm）の真っ直ぐな側面を持つ器2つに油を塗ります。

instructions.en: Pour the batter evenly into the two greased dishes.
instructions.sk: Cesto rovnomerne nalejte do dvoch vymastených nádob.
instructions.ja: 生地を2つの油を塗った器に均等に注ぎます。

instructions.en: Microwave on HIGH for 2 minutes, or until the muffins spring back when touched lightly.
instructions.sk: Varte v mikrovlnnej rúre na vysokom výkone 2 minúty alebo kým sa muffiny po ľahkom dotyku nevrátia späť.
instructions.ja: 電子レンジの高温で2分間、またはマフィンを軽く触って跳ね返るまで加熱します。

instructions.en: Turn out onto a plate and let cool until they can be handled.
instructions.sk: Vyklopte na tanier a nechajte vychladnúť, kým sa s nimi nebude dať manipulovať.
instructions.ja: 皿に取り出し、扱えるくらいまで冷まします。

instructions.en: Slice each muffin in half horizontally. They will be very thin.
instructions.sk: Každý muffin vodorovne prekrojte na polovicu. Budú veľmi tenké.
instructions.ja: 各マフィンを水平に半分に切ります。非常に薄くなります。

instructions.en: Toast in a toaster oven until very brown and crispy.
instructions.sk: Opečte v toastovacej rúre, kým nebudú veľmi hnedé a chrumkavé.
instructions.ja: トースターオーブンで、こんがりとして香ばしくなるまで焼きます。

notes: These Low Carb English Muffins are a quick and easy keto-friendly alternative to traditional English muffins. They're made with Carbquik and flax meal, which keeps the carb count low while providing fiber. The recipe yields 2 muffins, which are then split to make 4 thin halves. For best results, toast them well to achieve a crispy texture similar to traditional English muffins. These can be used as a base for breakfast sandwiches or served with butter and low-carb jam.
